soc.robot
Class RobotClient

java.lang.Object
  soc.client.DisplaylessPlayerClient
      soc.robot.RobotClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RobotClient
extends DisplaylessPlayerClient

This is a client that can play Settlers of Catan.

Author:
Robert S Thomas

disconnectReconnect

public void disconnectReconnect()
disconnect and then try to reconnect. If the reconnect fails, DisplaylessPlayerClient.ex is set. Otherwise ex is null.

treat

public void treat(Message mes)
Treat the incoming messages. Messages of unknown type are ignored (mes will be null from Message.toMsg(String)).

Overrides:
treat in class DisplaylessPlayerClient
Parameters:
mes - the message
